title: Pixel 4 hangs and restarts after unlocking.
content:
I have a Pixel 4,
While i was using it, it randomly hanged and restarted.
Since then I have been unable to start my phone beyond the lock screen.

Here's what happens:
Phone boots > It asks for the phone password > I enter the password > Phone unlocks > I use the phone for around 10 seconds > It hangs and restarts again.
When it restarts, if I don't enter the password and remain on the lock screen, it does not hang.
So basically I'm stuck right now on the lock screen of the phone. I tried the safe mode. Phone hangs and restarts there also after I unlock it.

If I stay on the lock screen, I'm even able to pick up incoming calls.

I guess it must be a software issue because if it were to be caused by a faulty app, atleast the safe mode would work.

Anyone..??? Please help......
